mapper.select: SELECT a.idx, DATE_FORMAT(a.leadYMD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS leadYMD, a.contactFstName, a.contactLstName, a.contactEmail, a.partnerFstName, a.partnerLstName, a.partnerEmail, a.phone, a.cellPhone, a.city, a.stateCD, IFNULL(b.stateName, '') AS stateName, a.zip, a.addr, a.country, a.howHear, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD, '0321', a.howHear, '', 'Y') AS howHearName, a.howHearMore, a.areaInterested, a.notes, a.statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM('08', '0320', a.statusCD, '', 'Y') AS statusName, DATE_FORMAT(a.lastContactYMD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS lastContactYMD, a.jisaCD, a.regDate, a.regID, a.updDate, a.updID FROM globalbiz.CenterLeads AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.StateInfo AS b ON a.stateCD = b.stateCD WHERE idx = #{idx}
SELECT idx, clIdx, DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%m/%d/%Y %h:%i %p') AS noteDate, notes, jisaCD, regDate, regID FROM globalbiz.CenterLeadsNote WHERE clIdx = #{idx} ORDER BY regDate DESC
